title: macOS Agent Installation - Older Versions (macOS 10.14 and prior)

metadata.summary: This document provides details of how to install, verify, and uninstall the LimaCharlie sensor on macOS (versions 10.14 and prior).  We also offer [documentation for macOS 10.15 and newer](/v2/docs/macos-agent-installation-latest-os-versions).
